title: Thirty Seconds Over Tokyo
description: Edited by Robert Considine this is an account of the historic Doolittle Raid on Tokyo in 1942 by a crew member who lost a leg in the incident. The book was an immediate best seller and was soon made into a movie of the same name. Possible first, but is wartime printing with no price on inner flap, and paper laminate hardcover.
author: Ted W. Lawson
